Body: To make @jogloran 's answer more generic, one of the "easiest" way to generate an English (declarative) sentence where the verb is not the second constituent is to have an adverb in front of the sentence, e.g. Yesterday I read this book or Suddenly, a bird appears

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: trying to learn and help others learn :)
